channel.title: Economic headwinds on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Economic headwinds on FinanClub

item.title: GM
item.description: score:18 Chances: GM’s expansion into the EV market presents a significant opportunity for growth, especially as new competitors enter the space and inflation starts to cool. The demand for dividend stocks is expected to continue, providing stable income and diversification benefits for investors.
